agenda_items.title: Confirmation of the Minutes of 32nd BoG Meeting
agenda_items.details: Minutes of 32nd BoG held on January 17, 2015, were confirmed after incorporating changes suggested by Shri Sanjeev K. Sharma. Observations: (i) Items 37.16 and 37.16.9 of 32nd BoG read as 32.16.8 and 32.16.9; (ii) Item 32.16.8 on CAS is placed as separate Agenda Item 33.2.

agenda_items.title: Writ Petition WP(C) 97 of 2013 regarding CAS benefit
agenda_items.details: Special meeting called due to directions from High Court of Tripura dated 12/1/2015. BoG resolved it cannot process any CAS case after April 30, 2013, as NIT Council decision is final. Petitioners' concerns about victimization are misplaced. Decision to be communicated to petitioners by 31/05/2015.

agenda_items.title: Representations by 17 Associate Professors and legal notice regarding CAS
agenda_items.details: BoG has no jurisdiction to extend CAS benefit after April 30, 2013; NIT Agartala adopted 4-tier flexible faculty structure.

agenda_items.title: Writ Petition WP(C) 65 of 2015 by Smt. Tara Sen & 2 others regarding CAS
agenda_items.details: BoG not empowered to extend CAS benefit after April 30, 2013; 4-tier faculty structure already adopted.

agenda_items.title: Representation by Assistant Professors regarding CAS benefit
agenda_items.details: BoG not empowered to extend CAS benefit after April 30, 2013; 4-tier faculty structure already adopted.

agenda_items.title: Implementation of Recruitment Rules (RRs) for Non-Teaching posts
agenda_items.details: BoG approved Ministry of HRD proposal for implementation of RRs for Non-Teaching posts issued vide letter F.No.33-2/2013-TS.III, dated 5th February 2014.

closing: Meeting ended with a vote of thanks to the Chair.
